about.title: About
about.name: Wu Zheming
about.bio: I specialize in crafting secure, efficient, and visually aesthetic systems. Currently interning as a full-stack developer, gaining hands-on experience with Vue3, Flask, MySQL, and C# ‚Äî merging cybersecurity awareness with modern web development practices.
about.tech_desc: Technologies I use to craft efficient, secure, and visually stunning systems.
about.exp_sub: A glimpse into my hands-on journey building and securing systems.
about.extra_sub: Leadership, teamwork, and community impact beyond academics.

extra1.title: NYP Community Service Council (Council Chief)
extra1.desc: Led the NYP Community Service Council overseeing multiple community outreach projects and student initiatives. Directed event planning, delegation, and collaborations with external organizations.

extra2.title: NYAA Students Club (Executive Committee)
extra2.desc: Spearheaded leadership and service-learning programs under the National Youth Achievement Award framework. Coordinated volunteer projects promoting civic responsibility and youth engagement.

extra3.title: Hougang Secondary Symphonic Band (Quartermaster)
extra3.desc: Managed instruments and music logistics, ensuring performance readiness. Developed discipline, coordination, and collaborative skills through numerous school showcases.

about.cert_sub: Credentials that showcase continuous learning, hands-on expertise, and dedication to the cybersecurity & IT field.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects I‚Äôve built ‚Äî blending full-stack development and cybersecurity.

cyber.title: Cybersecurity Simulation & Defense Architecture
cyber.desc: Conducted a red-team / blue-team enterprise simulation analyzing data exfiltration vectors, MFA failures, and segmentation bypass. Designed a multi-layer defense integrating Splunk SIEM, Wazuh, ModSecurity WAF, YARA, RDPGuard, and pfSense with OpenVPN. Built SOC-style response test cases to reduce MTTD/MTTR in simulated breach scenarios.

infosec.title: Infosecurity Project
infosec.desc: Developed and deployed a comprehensive Secure File Sharing and Management System specifically engineered to meet the stringent security and compliance requirements of the healthcare sector. The platform was designed to mitigate critical risks, including unauthorized access to sensitive patient data, accidental data leaks, and the complex challenges of adhering to regulatory standards like PDPA and ISO 27001.

appsec.title: Application Security Project
appsec.desc: Robust and secure web application from the ground up, with a core focus on proactively identifying and mitigating the OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities. This project was founded on a 'secure by design' philosophy, embedding security principles throughout the entire development lifecycle, from architectural planning and data handling to user authentication and incident response protocols.

resume.profile_desc: Cybersecurity & Digital Forensics student at Nanyang Polytechnic. Passionate about secure system design, full-stack development, and network defense. Skilled in Python, Flask, Vue3, and modern security tools.

resume.exp2_desc: Handled POS, food preparation, and daily operations.
